title: Which one is the BEST Flipper Zero? #shorts #flipperzero #bluetooth
description: In this video I show you how to use a Flipper Zero against iPhones and Android phones:    #flipperzero #iphone #android
transcript: I've been collecting Flipper Zero's. Here's my white hat Flipper Zero, my black hat Flipper Zero, another white hat Flipper Zero and I've just received another one this one is a special Flipper Zero recently been released this is a multi-hat Flipper Zero basically a transparent Flipper Zero I'll pull this off what's your favorite do you like the white Flipper Zero? Do you prefer the black Flipper Zero? Do you like this transparent Flipper Zero? So transparent case which is your favorite firmware? I've got unleashed firmware running on one of these Flipper Zero's, I've got extreme and I've obviously got the official Flipper Zero firmware running on this new Flipper Zero. Flipper Zero's are fantastic they allow you to test a whole bunch of devices and I've demonstrated many devices using various technologies such as sub gigahertz, bluetooth and so forth on my channel. Great way to learn about ethical hacking. I'm just joking about this being black hat, only test stuff ethically.
